    • Constructor Detail

      • TankClient

        public TankClient(java.lang.String tHost,
                  int tPort)
        Constructor for the TankClient object Upon initialization TankClient will attempt to connect to server. Upon success, it will check for ping response from server. If it's unsuccesful and error will be logged, and it will retry indefinately.
        Parameters:
        tHost - tank host to connect to
        tPort - tank port to connect to

    • Method Detail

      • consume

        public java.util.ArrayList<TankMessage> consume(java.lang.String topic,
                                                int partition,
                                                long rSeqNum)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                TankException
        performs a consume request from server and returns the data
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to consume from
        partition - the partition to consume from
        rSeqNum - the sequence number to start consuming from.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the response data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TankException

      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.String topic,
                    int partition,
                    java.util.ArrayList<TankMessage> msgs)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    TankException
        publishes an ArrayList of messages to tank server.
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic to publish to
        partition - the partition to publish to
        msgs - the ArrayList of messages to publish
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TankException
